rules_text:
Salvage {2}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by sacrificing two artifacts in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]
If you cast this Vehicle for its salvage cost, it becomes an artifact creature.
When this Vehicle enters, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the exiled creature's power.
Crew 2
